mapper.insert: insert into gym_sales(gs_dep_num, gs_dep_mem, gs_dep_history,gs_state,gs_pay_amount, gs_pay_method,gs_account_due,gs_ref_amount, gs_billing_person,gs_dep_date,gs_division, gs_ticp_num) values(pf_Ins.NEXTVAL,#{gs_dep_mem},#{gs_dep_history},'입금완료', #{gs_pay_amount},#{gs_pay_method},'없음',#{gs_ref_amount}, #{gs_billing_person},#{gs_dep_date},'직원','123')
